intermediate.question: What is the primary advantage of using Firebase Authentication for backend development?

Configure OAuth provider credentials in their respective platform
Set up Firestore to store user data
intermediate.hint: This step involves setting up credentials on the provider's platform, not Firebase.

Use Firebase's built-in session management features
Implement custom session management with cookies
Keep sessions permanent regardless of user activity
intermediate.hint: Firebase offers features to handle sessions securely without manual intervention.

options: Using try-catch blocks to handle authentication errors
Displaying all error messages to the user for transparency
Logging errors to the console only
Ignoring errors to simplify the user experience

Display raw error messages to users
